title: fuel_data
description: contains specific cost, emission and lifetime information for several maritime fuels

sources.name: fuel_data_references
sources.description: Same spread-sheet structure as the fuel_data.csv. Contains all deployed original sources to compile the data.

license.name: e.g GNU General Public License 3.0
license.instruction: You are free: To Share, To Create, To Adapt; As long as you: Attribute, Share-Alike, Keep open!

fields.name: cf_€-MJ
fields.description: fuel costs in EUR2016 per mega-joule fuel

fields.name: ci_€-MJ
fields.description: infrastructure costs in EUR2016 per mega-joul fuel

fields.name: ef-co2-w2t_g-MJ
fields.description: well-to-tank carbon dioxide emission factor in gram per mega-joul fuel

fields.name: ef-ch4-w2t_g-MJ
fields.description: well-to-tank methane emission factor in gram per mega-joul fuel

fields.name: sox_g-g
fields.description: sulphur content of fuel as a mass share in gram per gram
